act_pit.actname: Southern Interior Development Initiative Trust Act

change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "Southern Interior one-time development allocation" BEFORE amended by 2023-47-116, effective November 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).

bcl:definition.bcl:text: Southern Interior one-time development allocation means any money paid by the government to the Southern Interior Development Initiative Trust;

change.changenote: Section 14 (2) (second one) was renumbered (3) by BC Reg 18/2010 under RS1996-440-12, effective January 15, 2010 (BC Reg 18/2010).
Section 17 BEFORE amended by 2023-47-117, effective November 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Limit on the Southern Interior one-time development allocation
bcl:section.bcl:text: Despite any other enactment, if the government makes Southern Interior one-time development allocation payments to the Southern Interior Development Initiative Trust, the total of those payments must not exceed $50 million.

change.changenote: Section 20 (1) (f) BEFORE repealed by 2023-47-118, effective November 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).
Section 20 (1) (k) was added by 2023-47-118, effective November 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).
